synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: 3,5-bis(4-pyridyl)benzoic acid (2.76 g, 10 mmol), 1,2-diaminobenzene (1.08 g, 10 mmol), PPA (30 g)
CuI (15 mg, 0.079 mmol), L (10 mg, 0.029 mmol)

synthesis_conditions.method: Bright yellow crystals of compound 1 were exposed to air for 3-4 h to generate red-brown crystals of 2 quantitatively.

A small vial (25 mL) with the red-brown crystals of 2 was sealed in a larger vial (250 mL) with 16% formalin solution (20 mL) for 24 h, the red-brown crystals of 2 changed to the yellow crystals of 3 quantitatively.
